meanings.sent1: She enjoys remoulding clay into new shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist is remoulding the sculpture to make it more modern.
meanings.sent3: The children were remoulding their sandcastles after the wave destroyed them.
meanings.sent4: Her experience abroad remoulded her perspective on life.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter was remoulding the wood to fit the new design perfectly.

meanings.definition: The act of molding again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The remoulding of the old building brought new life to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Remoulding of the plastic parts is necessary to maintain the machine's efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The remoulding of the cake into a different shape made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The remoulding of traditions can sometimes lead to exciting new customs.
meanings.sent5: The remoulding of the garden transformed it into a beautiful oasis.
